Protocols/PXTrackerListener.html#/c:@M@M.name: trackScreen(screenName:extraParams:)
Protocols/PXTrackerListener.html#/c:@M@M.abstract: This method is called when a new screen is shown to the user and tracked by our Checkout.

Protocols/PXTrackerListener.html#/c:@M@M.name: trackEvent(screenName:action:result:extraParams:)
Protocols/PXTrackerListener.html#/c:@M@M.abstract: This method is called when a new event is ocurred to the user and tracked by our Checkout.

Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.name: paymentProcessorViewController()
Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.abstract: ViewController associated to your Payment Processor. This is optional VC. If you need a screen to make the payment, return your Payment processor viewController. If you return nil, we use our custom Animated progress Button.

Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.name: support()
Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Use this method to decide if your Payment Processor support the Payment.

Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.name: didReceive(navigationHandler:)
Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Receive a navigation handler for your custom Payment Processor. PXPaymentProcessorNavigationHandler. If you create your custom vieeController to make the payment, you should use it this handler.

Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.name: didReceive(checkoutStore:)
Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Receive a reference to checkout store with: PXPaymentData and PXCheckoutPreference.

Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.name: startPayment(checkoutStore:errorHandler:successWithBusinessResult:successWithPaymentResult:)
Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Method that we will call if paymentProcessorViewController() is nil. You can return the data of your custom payment. You can return a PXGenericPayment or PXBusinessResult.

Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.name: paymentTimeOut()
Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Optional method to inform your Payment timeout. (This is the timeout of your payment backend). Define this value for a superb checkout animated progress button experience.

Protocols/PXPaymentMethodConfigProtocol..name: shouldSkip(store:)
Protocols/PXPaymentMethodConfigProtocol..abstract: Use this method to decide whether the screen should show or not.

Protocols/PXPaymentMethodConfigProtocol..name: didReceive(checkoutStore:theme:)
Protocols/PXPaymentMethodConfigProtocol..abstract: Optional method to receive the PXCheckoutStore data and current theme PXTheme.

Protocols/PXPaymentMethodConfigProtocol..name: navigationHandler(navigationHandler:)
Protocols/PXPaymentMethodConfigProtocol..abstract: Optional method to receive the plugin navigation handler. Use this to execute next screen, show loading, etc.

Protocols/PXPaymentProcessorErrorHandler.name: showError()
Protocols/PXPaymentProcessorErrorHandler.abstract: Use this method to make a shake action on the loading progress payment button and change the color to red

Protocols/PXLazyInitProtocol.html#/c:@M@.name: didFinish(checkout:)
Protocols/PXLazyInitProtocol.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Init checkout methods finished. The checkout is ready to start. You receive the MercadoPagoCheckout reference.

Protocols/PXLifeCycleProtocol.html#/c:@M.name: cancelCheckout()
Protocols/PXLifeCycleProtocol.html#/c:@M.abstract: User cancel checkout. By any cancel UI button or back navigation action. You can return an optional block, to override the default exit cancel behavior. Default exit cancel behavior is back navigation stack.

Protocols/PXLifeCycleProtocol.html#/c:@M.name: finishCheckout(payment:)
Protocols/PXLifeCycleProtocol.html#/c:@M.abstract: User finish checkout with Payment information PXPayment. You can return an optional block, to override the default exit behavior. Default exit behavior is popToRoot.

Protocols/PXLifeCycleProtocol.html#/c:@M.name: changePaymentMethodTapped()
Protocols/PXLifeCycleProtocol.html#/c:@M.abstract: User tap on our change payment method action. If you return a block,

Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.name: navigationBar()
Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.abstract: Define your navigation bar color. PXThemeProperty background and PXThemeProperty tint color for font color.

Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.name: loadingComponent()
Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.abstract: Full screen loading colores. PXThemeProperty background and PXThemeProperty tint color for animated spinner color.

Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.name: highlightBackgroundColor()
Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.abstract: Use this color for Revisa & Confirma screen header background color.

Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.name: detailedBackgroundColor()
Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.abstract: Use this color for Revisa & Confirma body background color.

Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.name: highlightNavigationTintColor()
Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.abstract: Optional method to override the color of navigation bar text color for highlight backgrounds.

Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.name: statusBarStyle()
Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.abstract: Checkout status bar style. Use the native UIStatusBarStyle

Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.name: fontName()
Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.abstract: Optional method to set your custom font.

Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.name: lightFontName()
Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.abstract: Optional method to set your custom light font.

Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.name: semiBoldFontName()
Protocols/PXTheme.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.abstract: Optional method to set your custom semi-bold font.

Protocols/PXTheme.html.name: PXTheme
Protocols/PXTheme.html.abstract: Protocol to define advanced customization of your UI.

Protocols/PXLifeCycleProtocol.html.name: PXLifeCycleProtocol
Protocols/PXLifeCycleProtocol.html.abstract: Implement this protocol in order to keep you informed about important actions in our checkout life cycle.

Protocols/PXLazyInitProtocol.html.name: PXLazyInitProtocol
Protocols/PXLazyInitProtocol.html.abstract: Use PXLazyInitProtocol to start the checkout init services in lazy mode (without UI). Implement this protocol and keep you informed when the checkout is ready to launch.

Protocols/PXPaymentProcessorErrorHandler.name: PXPaymentProcessorErrorHandler
Protocols/PXPaymentProcessorErrorHandler.abstract: Handler protocol to manage wrong scenarios related with your custom Processor

Protocols/PXPaymentMethodConfigProtocol..name: PXPaymentMethodConfigProtocol
Protocols/PXPaymentMethodConfigProtocol..abstract: Implement this Protocol to show and optional screen UIViewController in your custom payment method flow. (Configure custom payment method step). We push this screen after you choose the means of payment.

Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html.name: PXPaymentProcessor
Protocols/PXPaymentProcessor.html.abstract: Implement this protocol to create your custom Payment Processor.

Protocols/PXTrackerListener.html.name: PXTrackerListener
Protocols/PXTrackerListener.html.abstract: Protocol to stay notified about our tracking screens/events.

Enums/PXSites.html.name: PXSites
Enums/PXSites.html.abstract: We use PXSites raw string values. Use this enum only for reference.

Classes/PXTracker.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.name: setListener(_:)
Classes/PXTracker.html#/c:@M@MercadoPago.abstract: Set your own tracker listener protocol to be aware of PX-Checkout tracking events

Classes/PXPaymentMethodPlugin.html#/c:@M.name: initPaymentMethodPlugin
Classes/PXPaymentMethodPlugin.html#/c:@M.abstract: Async block to initialize your payment method plugin.

Classes/PXPaymentMethodPlugin.html#/c:@M.name: mustShowPaymentMethodPlugin
Classes/PXPaymentMethodPlugin.html#/c:@M.abstract: Determinate if your payment method plugin should be show.

Classes/PXPaymentMethodPlugin.html#/c:@C.name: setPaymentMethodConfig(config:)
Classes/PXPaymentMethodPlugin.html#/c:@C.abstract: Set config screen for payment method. Implementing PXPaymentMethodConfigProtocol

Classes/PXPaymentMethodPlugin.html#/c:@C.name: setDisplayOrder(order:)
Classes/PXPaymentMethodPlugin.html#/c:@C.abstract: Set display order for your custom payment method. The values are TOP or BOTTOM.

Classes/PXCheckoutPreference.html#/c:@CM.name: setExpirationDate(_:)
Classes/PXCheckoutPreference.html#/c:@CM.abstract: Date that indicates when this preference expires.

Classes/PXCheckoutPreference.html#/c:@CM.name: setActiveFromDate(_:)
Classes/PXCheckoutPreference.html#/c:@CM.abstract: Date that indicates when this preference start.

Classes/PXCheckoutPreference.html#/c:@CM.name: addExcludedPaymentMethod(_:)
Classes/PXCheckoutPreference.html#/c:@CM.abstract: Add exclusion payment method id. If you exclude it, it’s not going appear as a payment method available on checkout.

Classes/PXCheckoutPreference.html#/c:@CM.name: setExcludedPaymentMethods(_:)
Classes/PXCheckoutPreference.html#/c:@CM.abstract: Add exclusion list by payment method id. If you exclude it, it’s not going appear as a payment method available on checkout.

Classes/PXCheckoutPreference.html#/c:@CM.name: setMaxInstallments(_:)
Classes/PXCheckoutPreference.html#/c:@CM.abstract: This value limits the amount of installments to be shown by the user.

Classes/PXBusinessResult.html#/c:@M@Merc.name: init(receiptId:status:title:subtitle:icon:mainAction:secondaryAction:helpMessage:showPaymentMethod:statementDescription:imageUrl:topCustomView:bottomCustomView:paymentStatus:paymentStatusDetail:)
Classes/PXBusinessResult.html#/c:@M@Merc.abstract: Creates a PXBusinessResult which represents Business Payment Result.

Classes/PXPaymentProcessorNavigationHand.name: didFinishPayment(businessResult:)
Classes/PXPaymentProcessorNavigationHand.abstract: Notify that your custom payment was finish. Send your custom PXBusinessResult object.

Classes/PXPaymentProcessorNavigationHand.name: didFinishPayment(status:statusDetail:paymentId:)
Classes/PXPaymentProcessorNavigationHand.abstract: Notify that your payment was finish. Send a default Payment.

Classes/PXPaymentProcessorNavigationHand.name: nextAndRemoveCurrentScreenFromStack()
Classes/PXPaymentProcessorNavigationHand.abstract: Call to Checkout next screen and remove current screen from stack.

Classes/MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder.html#.name: setPrivateKey(key:)
Classes/MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder.html#.abstract: Private key provides save card capabilities and account money balance. (User logged)

Classes/MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder.html#.name: setAdvancedConfiguration(config:)
Classes/MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder.html#.abstract: It provides support for custom checkout functionality/configure special behaviour

Classes/MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder.html#.name: setColor(checkoutColor:)
Classes/MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder.html#.abstract: You can set one color (your primary color) and we will take care of the rest. Delivering the best Checkout experience based on your color. If you need more customization explore PXTheme inside PXAdvancedConfiguration.

Classes/MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder.html#.name: setLanguage(_:)
Classes/MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder.html#.abstract: You can set the Language locale string. (es is the default value). For more values explore our PXLanguages public enum.

Classes/MercadoPagoCheckout.html#/c:@CM@.name: start(navigationController:lifeCycleProtocol:)
Classes/MercadoPagoCheckout.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Start checkout experience. This method push our ViewController in your navigation stack.

Classes/MercadoPagoCheckout.html#/c:@CM@.name: start(lazyInitProtocol:)
Classes/MercadoPagoCheckout.html#/c:@CM@.abstract: Start checkout init services in lazy mode (without UI). Start our init methods and provide a protocol to notify when the checkout is ready to launch PXLazyInitProtocol

Classes/PXPaymentResultConfiguration.htm.name: init(topView:bottomView:)
Classes/PXPaymentResultConfiguration.htm.abstract: Define your custom UIViews. topView and bottomView of the screen.

Classes/PXPaymentConfiguration.html#/c:@.name: addPaymentMethodPlugin(plugin:)
Classes/PXPaymentConfiguration.html#/c:@.abstract: Add your own payment method option to pay.

Classes/PXPaymentConfiguration.html#/c:@.name: addChargeRules(charges:)
Classes/PXPaymentConfiguration.html#/c:@.abstract: Add extra charges that will apply to total amount.

Classes/PXPaymentConfiguration.html#/c:@.name: setDiscountConfiguration(config:)
Classes/PXPaymentConfiguration.html#/c:@.abstract: PXDiscountConfiguration is an object that represents the discount to be applied or error information to present to the user. It’s mandatory to handle your discounts by hand if you set a payment processor.

Classes/PXDiscountConfiguration.html#/c:.name: init(discount:campaign:)
Classes/PXDiscountConfiguration.html#/c:.abstract: Set Mercado Pago discount that will be applied to total amount.

Classes/PXDiscountConfiguration.html#/c:.name: initForNotAvailableDiscount()
Classes/PXDiscountConfiguration.html#/c:.abstract: When you have the user have wasted all the discounts available

Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html#/c:.name: theme
Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html#/c:.abstract: Advanced UI color customization. Use this config to create your custom UI colors based on PXTheme protocol. Also you can use this protocol to customize your fonts.

Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html#/c:.name: escEnabled
Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html#/c:.abstract: Add the possibility to configure ESC behaviour.

Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html#/c:.name: bankDealsEnabled
Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html#/c:.abstract: Instores usage / money in usage. - Use case: Not all bank deals apply right now to all preferences.

Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html#/c:.name: reviewConfirmConfiguration
Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html#/c:.abstract: Enable to preset configurations to customize visualization on the ‘Review and Confirm screen’

Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html#/c:.name: paymentResultConfiguration
Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html#/c:.abstract: Enable to preset configurations to customize visualization on the ‘Congrats’ screen / ‘PaymentResult’ screen.

Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html.name: PXAdvancedConfiguration
Classes/PXAdvancedConfiguration.html.abstract: Advanced configuration provides you support for custom checkout functionality/configure special behaviour when checkout is running.

Classes/PXDiscountConfiguration.html.name: PXDiscountConfiguration
Classes/PXDiscountConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration related to Mercadopago discounts and campaigns. More details: PXDiscount and PXCampaign.

Classes/PXPaymentConfiguration.html.name: PXPaymentConfiguration
Classes/PXPaymentConfiguration.html.abstract: Any configuration related to the Payment. You can set you own PXPaymentProcessor. Configuration of discounts, charges and custom Payment Method Plugin.

Classes/PXPaymentResultConfiguration.htm.name: PXPaymentResultConfiguration
Classes/PXPaymentResultConfiguration.htm.abstract: This object declare custom preferences (customizations) for Congrats screen.

Classes/PXReviewConfirmConfiguration.htm.name: PXReviewConfirmConfiguration
Classes/PXReviewConfirmConfiguration.htm.abstract: This object declare custom preferences (customizations) for Review and Confirm screen.

Classes/MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder.html.name: MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder
Classes/MercadoPagoCheckoutBuilder.html.abstract: Checkout builder allow you to create a MercadoPagoCheckout. This is the only way to create MercadoPagoCheckout object.

Classes/PXAction.html.name: PXAction
Classes/PXAction.html.abstract: This is for custom actionas. Label + clousure action. We need this object in certains scenarios. For example in PXBusinessResult custom button actions.

Classes/PXCheckoutStore.html.name: PXCheckoutStore
Classes/PXCheckoutStore.html.abstract: Shared public class to provide information about our Checkout. Like PXPaymentData or PXCheckoutPreference.

Classes/PXThemeProperty.html.name: PXThemeProperty
Classes/PXThemeProperty.html.abstract: Use this object to create certains properties to define PXTheme implementation.

Classes/PXGenericPayment.html.name: PXGenericPayment
Classes/PXGenericPayment.html.abstract: Use this object in order to notify you own custom payment using PXPaymentProcessor.

Classes/PXPaymentProcessorNavigationHand.name: PXPaymentProcessorNavigationHandler
Classes/PXPaymentProcessorNavigationHand.abstract: Navigation handler to manage communication between your Processor and our Checkout. You should use this navigation handler only with custom Processor view. When you use a custom UIViewController to present youur own view, you can use this Object in order to notify: didFinishPayment, showLoading, hideLoading.

Classes/PXBusinessResult.html.name: PXBusinessResult
Classes/PXBusinessResult.html.abstract: This class represents a business payment result.

Classes/PXPaymentTypeChargeRule.html.name: PXPaymentTypeChargeRule
Classes/PXPaymentTypeChargeRule.html.abstract: Use this object to make a charge related to any payment method. The relationship is by paymentMethodId. You can especify a default amountCharge for each payment method.

Classes/PXPaymentMethodPlugin.html.name: PXPaymentMethodPlugin
Classes/PXPaymentMethodPlugin.html.abstract: Use to create yout custom payment option. We´ll display this option in the payment method selection screen.

Classes/PXDiscount.html.name: PXDiscount
Classes/PXDiscount.html.abstract: Model that represents the discount which will be applied to a payment.

Classes/PXPayment.html.name: PXPayment
Classes/PXPayment.html.abstract: This is our Payment object. When we make the payment, we return this object in the checkout exit. More details in: PXLifeCycleProtocol finishCheckout method.

Classes/PXTracker.html.name: PXTracker
Classes/PXTracker.html.abstract: Use this object to call methods related to our PX tracker.
